title: Bloomberg Markets: Cuggino on Gold a `Significant Component'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cuggino on Gold a `Significant Component'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Michael Cuggino President and Portfolio Manager The Permanent Portfolio Family of Funds Discussing the markets and investment strategy, including why he likes gold.
